g.title: added-to-existing-cluster
g.text: added-to-existing-cluster

g.title: added-to-existing-cluster->added-to-existing-cluster
g.text: Refresh - Day 2 hosts should stay in added state

g.title: cancelled
g.text: cancelled

g.title: cancelled->cancelled
g.text: Refresh - Log collection timed out during cancelled should stay in cancelled

g.title: cancelled->cancelled
g.text: Refresh - Refresh during cancelled should stay in cancelled

g.title: disconnected
g.text: disconnected

g.title: disconnected->disconnected
g.text: Refresh - Move host to disconnected when connected times out

g.title: discovering
g.text: discovering

g.title: disconnected->discovering
g.text: Refresh - Host reconnected without inventory

g.title: insufficient
g.text: insufficient

g.title: disconnected->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host has insufficient hardware

g.title: disconnected->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host not ready

g.title: pending-for-input
g.text: pending-for-input

g.title: disconnected->pending-for-input
g.text: Refresh - Host pending input

g.title: known
g.text: known

g.title: disconnected->known
g.text: Refresh - Host ready

g.title: discovering->disconnected
g.text: Refresh - Move host to disconnected when connected times out

g.title: discovering->discovering
g.text: Refresh - Host reconnected without inventory

g.title: discovering->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host has insufficient hardware

g.title: discovering->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host not ready

g.title: discovering->pending-for-input
g.text: Refresh - Host pending input

g.title: discovering->known
g.text: Refresh - Host ready

g.title: insufficient->disconnected
g.text: Refresh - Move host to disconnected when connected times out

g.title: insufficient->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host has insufficient hardware

g.title: insufficient->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host not ready

g.title: insufficient->pending-for-input
g.text: Refresh - Host pending input

g.title: insufficient->known
g.text: Refresh - Host ready

g.title: pending-for-input->disconnected
g.text: Refresh - Move host to disconnected when connected times out

g.title: pending-for-input->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host has insufficient hardware

g.title: pending-for-input->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host not ready

g.title: pending-for-input->pending-for-input
g.text: Refresh - Host pending input

g.title: pending-for-input->known
g.text: Refresh - Host ready

g.title: known->disconnected
g.text: Refresh - Move host to disconnected when connected times out

g.title: known->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Preparing failed disk speed host move to insufficient

g.title: known->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host has insufficient hardware

g.title: known->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Host not ready

g.title: known->pending-for-input
g.text: Refresh - Host pending input

g.title: known->known
g.text: Refresh - Host stay ready

g.title: preparing-for-installation
g.text: preparing-for-installation

g.title: known->preparing-for-installation
g.text: Refresh - Refresh known host in preparing cluster

g.title: error
g.text: error

g.title: error->error
g.text: Refresh - Log collection timed out during error should stay in error

g.title: error->error
g.text: Refresh - Refresh during error should stay in error

g.title: installed
g.text: installed

g.title: installed->error
g.text: Refresh - Move host to error when cluster is in error

g.title: installed->installed
g.text: Refresh - Refresh during installed state without cluster error should stay in installed state

g.title: installing
g.text: installing

g.title: installing->error
g.text: Refresh - Move host to error when cluster is in error

g.title: installing->error
g.text: Refresh - Move host to error when installation times out

g.title: installing->error
g.text: Refresh - Move installing host to error when connection times out

g.title: installing->installing
g.text: Refresh - Keep installing host when connection times out

g.title: installing->installing
g.text: Refresh - Keep installing host when host recovers from disconnection

g.title: installing->installing
g.text: Refresh - Refresh during installing state without cluster error should stay in installing state

g.title: installing-in-progress
g.text: installing-in-progress

g.title: installing-in-progress->error
g.text: Refresh - Move host to error when cluster is in error

g.title: installing-in-progress->error
g.text: Refresh - Move installing host to error when connection times out

g.title: installing-in-progress->error
g.text: Refresh - Move to error on timeout if host is in particular installation in progress stages other than [writing-image-to-disk, rebooting]

g.title: installing-in-progress->error
g.text: Refresh - Move to error on timeout if host is in particular installation in progress stage writing-image-to-disk

g.title: installing-in-progress->installing-in-progress
g.text: Refresh - Keep installing host when connection times out

g.title: installing-in-progress->installing-in-progress
g.text: Refresh - Keep installing host when host recovers from disconnection

g.title: installing-in-progress->installing-in-progress
g.text: Refresh - Ignore timeout if host is in particular installation in progress stages

g.title: installing-in-progress->installing-in-progress
g.text: Refresh - Indicate that timeout occurred and continue installation in particular installation in progress stages other than [writing-image-to-disk, rebooting]

g.title: installing-in-progress->installing-in-progress
g.text: Refresh - Indicate that timeout occurred and continue installation in particular installation in progress stage writing-image-to-disk

g.title: installing-in-progress->installing-in-progress
g.text: Refresh - Refresh during installing-in-progress state without cluster error should stay in installing-in-progress state

g.title: installing-pending-user-action
g.text: installing-pending-user-action

g.title: installing-in-progress->installing-pending-user-action
g.text: Refresh - Tell user about boot order wen reboot takes too long

g.title: installing-pending-user-action->error
g.text: Refresh - Move host to error when cluster is in error

g.title: installing-pending-user-action->installing-pending-user-action
g.text: Refresh - Refresh during installing-pending-user-action state without cluster error should stay in installing-pending-user-action state

g.title: preparing-for-installation->disconnected
g.text: Refresh - Move preparing host to disconnected when connection times out

g.title: preparing-for-installation->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Preparing failed disk speed host move to insufficient

g.title: preparing-for-installation->known
g.text: Refresh - Move preparing host to known when cluster stops preparing

g.title: preparing-for-installation->preparing-for-installation
g.text: Refresh - Stay in preparing for installation

g.title: preparing-failed
g.text: preparing-failed

g.title: preparing-for-installation->preparing-failed
g.text: Refresh - Preparing timed out host move to known

g.title: preparing-for-installation->preparing-failed
g.text: Refresh - Preparing failed image pull host move to preparing failed

g.title: preparing-successful
g.text: preparing-successful

g.title: preparing-for-installation->preparing-successful
g.text: Refresh - Refresh successfully preparing host

g.title: preparing-failed->disconnected
g.text: Refresh - Move host to disconnected when connected times out

g.title: preparing-failed->insufficient
g.text: Refresh - Preparing failed disk speed host move to insufficient

g.title: preparing-failed->known
g.text: Refresh - Failed preparing to known when cluster is no longer preparing

g.title: preparing-successful->disconnected
g.text: Refresh - Move preparing host to disconnected when connection times out

g.title: preparing-successful->known
g.text: Refresh - Successful preparing to known when cluster is no longer preparing

g.title: preparing-successful->installing
g.text: Refresh - Move successfully prepared host to installing

g.title: preparing-successful->preparing-successful
g.text: Refresh - Stay in preparing successful

g.title: reclaiming
g.text: reclaiming

g.title: reclaiming->reclaiming
g.text: Refresh - Refresh without timeout during reclaiming should stay in reclaiming

g.title: unbinding-pending-user-action
g.text: unbinding-pending-user-action

g.title: reclaiming->unbinding-pending-user-action
g.text: Refresh - Refresh reclaiming host

g.title: reclaiming-rebooting
g.text: reclaiming-rebooting

g.title: reclaiming-rebooting->unbinding-pending-user-action
g.text: Refresh - Refresh reclaiming host

g.title: reclaiming-rebooting->reclaiming-rebooting
g.text: Refresh - Refresh without timeout during reclaiming-rebooting should stay in reclaiming-rebooting

g.title: resetting
g.text: resetting

g.title: resetting->resetting
g.text: Refresh - Refresh during resetting should stay in resetting

g.title: resetting-pending-user-action
g.text: resetting-pending-user-action

g.title: resetting-pending-user-action->error
g.text: Refresh - Move host to error when cluster is in error

g.title: resetting-pending-user-action->resetting-pending-user-action
g.text: Refresh - Refresh during resetting-pending-user-action state without cluster error should stay in resetting-pending-user-action state
